title: Message to the United Campaign Appeal of Philadelphia.
text:
My dear Mr. Curtis:

I have received your telegram and do feel gratification that the United Campaign Appeal of Philadelphia has been oversubscribed. I wish most heartily to congratulate you and your colleagues and the people of Philadelphia on the fine spirit shown. Yours faithfully,

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [Mr. Cyrus H. K. Curtis, Chairman, Welfare Federation, Philadelphia, Pa.]
